pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling Tools for Reproduction and Survival Data in Ecotoxicology // Tools for ecotoxicologists and regulators dedicated to the mathematical and statistical modelling of toxicity test data. They use advanced and innovative methods for a valuable quantitative environmental risk assessment. See also Delignette-Muller et al. (2017) doi:10.1021/acs.est.6b05326. and Baudrot et al. (2018) doi:10.1021/acs.est.7b05464.
